summary: By request I made Earthice Sword.
descriptionHtml:
Please Endorse mods you like! If you're using it, that means, you like it..

Author:
    Squall

Description:
    I got request for this...
    Adds to the game "Earthice Sword".
    I lack the required skills to make it high quality.
    
Installation:
    Always make a save copy before using any mods!
    Extract Data folder to your Game DIR and enable "Wp_SwordOfIce.esp" plugin.
    
Uninstallation:
    Delete Wp_SwordOfIce.esp file from Game DIR/data.
    Delete SwordOfIce folder from Game DIR/data/meshes/weapons.
    Delete SwordOfIce folder from Game DIR/data/textures/weapons.

Crafting requirements:
        Earthice Sword:
    Daedric Smithing Perk
    Daedra Heart
    Frost Salt   
    Quicksilver Ingot
        Enchanted Earthice Sword:
    Daedric Smithing Perk
    Daedra Heart
    Frost Salt x2   
    Quicksilver Ingot x2
    
Tempering requirements:    
    Arcane Blacksmith Perk    
    Quicksilver Ingot
author: Squall
